Title: Imposes a tax on selected nicotine products
Summary: Imposes a tax on selected nicotine products, including, but not limited to a nicotine pouch or products intended to be made into a nicotine pouch by the consumer; defines a nicotine pouch as a smokeless pre-portioned pouch containing nicotine but no tobacco, which the user puts and leaves between their lip and gum while the nicotine and taste is being released; makes related provisions and technical amendments.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to taxes on selected nicotine products
